articles.title: Gainesville ISD releases findings into claims of bullying that led to 11-year-old's suicide
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers its streaming service through the KENS 5 app, available for mobile phone users.

articles.title: New Gas Station & Car Wash Complex Breaks Ground In Bridgeport
articles.author: Alfred Branch
articles.summary: A new facility on Seaview Avenue in Bridgeport is under construction and expected to open by January 2026. The facility will include a Dunkin' Donuts and sandwich shop, along with a gas station and car wash.

articles.title: Waze's latest update moves your maps right into your line of sight
articles.author: Will Sattelberg
articles.summary: Waze has launched version 5.4 of its navigation service, which includes support for displaying routes on a car's heads-up display (HUD). This new feature is available through Android Auto and CarPlay in supported vehicles. The update allows users to view turn-by-turn directions and ETA information on their HUD.

articles.title: net2phone Introduces Advanced AI Agent  Feb. 27, 2025 22:20
articles.summary: net2phone introduced net2phone AI Agent, a virtual agent designed to enhance customer experiences across sales, support, and administrative tasks. The AI Agent utilizes conversational AI to interact with customers, manage appointments, process returns, and provide personalized account data. It operates across multiple channels, including websites, phone, and chat, and is available in multiple languages.

articles.title: Scroll Smarter, Live Easier: EazyScroll launches Innovative Smart Case
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: EazyScroll has launched its Kickstarter campaign for the EazyScroll Smartcase, the world's first smartphone case with a built-in back touchpad designed for ergonomic scrolling and navigation. The smart case aims to address hand strain and accessibility limitations, offering features like back touchpad navigation, an ergonomic design, and a durable, stylish case. Early Kickstarter supporters will receive discounted pricing and early access before the planned 2025 retail launch.

articles.title: Meta plans paid subscription service for chatbot Meta AI, source says
articles.author: Katie Paul
articles.summary: Meta Platforms is planning to test a paid subscription service for its AI-enabled chatbot, Meta AI, in the second quarter of this year. Launched in September 2023, Meta AI is a virtual assistant that uses large language models. Meta also plans to debut a standalone Meta AI app to join Facebook and Instagram during the second quarter.

articles.title: How to Unlock Android Phone Safely Within Seconds?
articles.author: Oki Bin Oki
articles.summary: Wondershare is launching Dr.Fone- Screen Unlock (Android). Dr.Fone is a software that helps users to unlock their Android devices if they have forgotten their password, PIN, or pattern without any data loss. Dr.Fone offers a seamless and easy-to-use data unlocking process.

articles.title: Watch: 'Pokemon Legends: Z-A' gets teaser, late 2025 release date
articles.author: Jessica Inman
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company will release Pokémon Legends: Z-A in late 2025. Pokémon Champions, a battle game, will be released on Nintendo Switch consoles and mobile devices. Netflix will feature new episodes of the stop-motion series Pokémon Concierge in September.

articles.title: Pilot program will make it easier for Nova Scotians to identify local products
articles.author: Francis Campbell
articles.summary: The Nova Scotia government launched the "Nova Scotia Loyal" producer labelling pilot program, providing funding for businesses to print the Nova Scotia Loyal logo on their product packaging. This initiative aims to help consumers identify and support local products. Companies like Avon Valley Floral and The Station Food Hub anticipate benefits from the program, including increased sales due to enhanced product visibility.

articles.title: Samsung S25 Edge specs
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to introduce the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new addition to its flagship lineup.

articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to introduce the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new addition to its flagship lineup.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge colors
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to introduce a new addition to its flagship lineup, the Galaxy S25 Edge.

articles.title: Say Goodbye to Pricks and Scratches! This $20 Conditioner for Him Softens and Hydrates Dry, Brittle Beards
articles.author: Jasmine Washington
articles.summary: A new beard conditioner is introduced to improve beard health, made with 96% natural ingredients and available in Classic (bergamot, clary sage, patchouli) and coconut apricot scents. The conditioner is easy to use, requiring a short application time after washing the beard to improve texture and promote a well-maintained look.

articles.title: Tencent launches new AI model to take on DeepSeek: Can respond to queries faster than…
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Tencent has launched its new AI model, Hunyuan Turbo S, designed to compete with DeepSeek. Hunyuan Turbo S can respond to queries in under a second. The deployment cost of Turbo S has also been significantly reduced.

articles.title: 3 Skincare Sets To Shop For Every Type Of Guy In Your Life
articles.author: Jana Pollack
articles.summary: Jack Black offers skincare sets designed for men. These include a starter package with cleanser, moisturizer, and lip balm; a travel set with face and body wash, shave product, and deodorant; and a beard grooming kit with beard wash, shave product, beard oil, and comb.

articles.title: Amazon to launch new lineup of Alexa Plus companion gadgets this fall
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Alexa Plus, a new product integrating generative AI, as part of its strategy to leverage AI across its services. The launch includes companion devices and a subscription model to generate revenue from new products and advertising interfaces.

articles.title: Hands-on with Alexa Plus in the smart home
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Alexa Plus, a new version of its voice assistant, with improved natural language understanding and smart home control. Alexa Plus includes features like creating routines via voice, an updated Echo Show UI, and improved cooking controls. It will be available in late March in the US for select Echo Show devices for $19.99 a month and is included in Prime membership.

articles.title: VANTAGE FILES FDA DRUG MASTER FILE FOR VYCERIN™ API GLYCERIN, USP DESIGNED SPECIFICALLY TO MEET ...
articles.author: Vantage Specialty Chemicals
articles.summary: Vantage Specialty Chemicals, Inc. launched its VYCERIN™ API Glycerin, USP, an active pharmaceutical ingredient (API) grade glycerin. The product is manufactured and packaged in the United States to ICH Q7 standards and is designed to meet the evolving needs of the pharmaceutical market.

articles.title: Everything announced at Pokémon Presents 2025
articles.author: Giovanni Colantonio
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company announced 'Pokémon Champions,' a new competitive game in development for Nintendo Switch, iOS, and Android. Updates were also revealed for existing mobile games, including 'Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket' and 'Pokémon Go.'

articles.title: 'Less Is More' Black-Owned Beauty Products To Try
articles.author: ESSENCE Beauty Editors
articles.summary: Fenty Beauty launched You Mist Setting Spray, and The Lip Bar introduced 2-In-1 Powder Blush + Bronzer. Rose Ingleton MD offers FutureBright Dark Spot Vitamin C Serum, while TGIN presents Miracle Styling Smooth And Sleek Wax Stick. Wyn Beauty by Serena Williams features Acceptance Speech Lip Gloss, completing the collection of new beauty products.

articles.title: Cydcor Event Services Capabilities Bring Brands to Life with Experiential Marketing
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Cydcor is expanding its service offerings to include a full suite of event services, leveraging its expertise in face-to-face interactions. These services, showcased at the Wine & Spirits Wholesalers of America (WSWA) Access Live event, include sports venue brand ambassadors, product education and training, and retail sales ambassadors. The goal is to provide brands with immersive experiences and drive consumer engagement.

articles.title: Google and Qualcomm Team Up to Bring 8 Years of Updates to Android Devices
articles.author: Joe Fedewa
articles.summary: Qualcomm announced that future Snapdragon 8 and 7-series chips will support up to eight years of software and security updates. This extended support is available to device manufacturers, starting with Android smartphones running on the Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform. Several upcoming devices, including the Samsung Galaxy S25 series, Xiaomi 15 Series, OnePlus 13, and Asus ROG Phone 9, are expected to qualify for this upgraded support cycle.

articles.title: The best honeys to keep in your pantry for cooking, baking and eating by the spoonful
articles.author: Zoe Malin
org: U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
articles.summary: Several companies offer unique honey products. Brightland Wildflower Honey is sourced from California wildflowers, resulting in a deep, fruity flavor. Savannah Bee Company sells acacia honey with honeycomb, offering a distinct taste. Mike's Hot Honey combines pure honey, chili peppers, and vinegar for a spicy condiment experience.

articles.title: New leak seemingly gives us a final look at the Nintendo Switch 2 dock
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: A leaked design has surfaced, revealing what seems to be the final dock design for the upcoming Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: Amazon's 'beast' handheld vacuum with 'good suction' now £27
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a promotional discount on a handheld vacuum cleaner, reducing its price from £49.99 to £27.07. Similarly, George at Asda has reduced the price of the Goblin Bagless Cylinder Vacuum Cleaner from £50 to £34.97.

articles.title: How to start a profitable business today with less than GH¢ 5,000
articles.summary: The article provides information on launching a Mobile Money & Phone Accessories business by registering for mobile money services and selling phone accessories. It also highlights launching a Food Vendor or Delivery Service, requiring cooking utensils and raw ingredients, as well as Liquid Soap & Detergent Production, needing training, raw materials and packaging bottles. Furthermore, it mentions launching Graphic Design & Printing Services needing a laptop, design software, and a printer to create branding materials.

articles.title: Amazon's Rufus AI Chat Is Dreadful, So I Use This AI Chatbot Alternative
articles.author: Danny Maiorca
articles.summary: Perplexity AI helps users discover products and deals on Amazon by providing summaries, direct links, and comparisons. It allows users to search for specific products by brand and access customer reviews from various sources. Perplexity provides product overviews and comparison capabilities for items available on Amazon.

articles.title: Microsoft Azure: What it is, how it works, and why it matters
articles.author: Sarah Dunsby
articles.summary: Microsoft Azure launched its cloud computing platform in 2008, followed by an Android release on January 31st, 2025, and an iOS launch on February 4th. Azure Quantum, offering access to quantum-based software and hardware, was first released for public preview in 2021. These launches provide users with new resources, virtual machines, and portals to support various endeavors.

articles.title: Dragons' Den: From a soap dispenser to cotton hair towels – these are the businesses pitching tonight
articles.author: Alex Lee
articles.summary: Snoap, co-founded by Lisa and Antony, introduced a soap and shampoo dispenser in 2023 that utilizes solid bars, costing £45. Kitt Medical, founded by Jack and James, launched an anaphylaxis kit in 2023 with a subscription-based service, priced at £650 per year. Human Beauty, founded by Millie Flemington-Clare in 2020, offers an inclusive makeup range, including a makeup therapy palette for £26 and liquid confidence mascara for £13. Carla founded Good Wash Day, launched in 2020, featuring hair towels made from organic cotton and elastane starting from £30.

articles.title: YETI is launching a new backpack. Sign up to get exclusive details
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: YETI is launching a new backpack on February 28th. Customers can create a free account to receive early access and information about the product launch, including benefits like free shipping and early access to new colors.

articles.title: Liquid lipsticks: Paint your lips in bold, transfer proof shades that will stay put through the day
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Several companies including Lakme, Smashbox, Huda Beauty, Bobbi Brown, Renee, Maybelline, Pilgrim, FACES CANADA, SWISS BEAUTY, and SUGAR are introducing liquid lipsticks with various features. These lipsticks boast long-lasting wear, matte and glossy finishes, transfer-proof formulas, and hydrating ingredients, catering to diverse preferences and occasions. Hindustan Times highlights these product launches and features.

articles.title: Crumbl and El Car Wash collaborate to offer FREE goodies on February 22, 2025
articles.author: Community News Releases
articles.summary: El Car Wash and Crumbl are partnering to offer customers a promotional event on February 22nd. The first 200 customers at each El Car Wash location will receive a free Crumbl dessert and an exclusive Crumbl/El Car Wash co-branded, cookie-scented air freshener with their car wash. This promotion is available for one day only.

articles.title: How LG's ThinQ Platform Is Changing Home Automation
articles.author: Marty Spargo
articles.summary: LG Electronics' LG ThinQ platform aims to enhance smart home living through AI and connectivity. The ThinQ app integrates LG devices like refrigerators, ovens, and TVs into a single ecosystem, enabling seamless automation.

articles.title: 3 ways Amazon just leapfrogged Apple, Google, and ChatGPT in the AI race
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Alexa+, a revamped voice assistant with agentic capabilities, designed to perform everyday tasks. This upgrade integrates with existing Alexa devices and is accessible through the Amazon Prime subscription. The new service aims to enhance user experience with conversational and multi-turn interactions.

articles.title: 'Magical' Ariel washing pods cost just 20p each on Amazon
articles.author: Shania King-Soyza
articles.summary: Ariel All-in-1 PODS are available on Amazon for £23.87 (reduced from £36.00) which makes them around 20p per pod. Designed for cooler, quicker wash cycles, these liquid laundry tablets can help reduce electricity costs by up to 60% and slash laundry-associated CO2 emissions.

articles.title: Amazon deal sees 'magical' Ariel washing pods cost just 20p each
articles.author: Shania King-Soyza
articles.summary: Ariel All-in-1 PODS laundry detergent is now available on Amazon for a reduced price of £23.87 for 122 pods. These liquid laundry tablets are designed for cooler, quicker wash cycles, effectively removing stains and potentially reducing electricity costs and CO2 emissions.

articles.title: From Heinz to Baileys: the secret to a great brand extension
articles.author: Tom White
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced new products and services as brand extensions. Colgate attempted to enter the frozen food market with Colgate Kitchen Entrees, while Frito-Lay launched a lemonade product. Heinz launched 'Beanz Liberation', Baileys has celebration cakes, and Coca-Cola introduced new flavors. Walkers crisps launched Cajun Squirrel flavor as a marketing initiative. Some extensions, such as the Colgate and Frito-Lay examples, were discontinued, while others, like Heinz and Coca-cola, found success.

articles.title: Introducing the New Video-First LTK Consumer App: Watch Creators Near You
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LTK is launching a new consumer app featuring a video-first experience, allowing users to discover creators by interests and location, and connect with friends. Simultaneously, LTK is introducing new content editing tools in the LTK Creator app to improve the creator experience.

articles.title: We curate initiatives based on rich insights for both consumers and employees: Kumar Venkatasubramanian
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble (P&G) is integrating AI to enhance operations and improve consumer experiences. The Pampers baby app uses data to provide personalized tips and health checks, and an AI-powered engine tailors product offerings based on local consumer preferences. P&G also developed chatPG, an in-house AI model, to enhance collaboration and innovation within the company.

articles.title: Microsoft launches free Office version for Windows with limited features in 2025
articles.author: Redação Mix Vale
articles.summary: Microsoft launched a free version of its Office suite for Windows in February 2025, including Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, accessible through the Microsoft Store. This version requires users to save changes to OneDrive and includes advertisements, but allows desktop access without a subscription. It is designed to compete with free alternatives like Google Docs and potentially convert users to paid Microsoft 365 plans.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Set for April 16 Launch, May Release Expected
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge on April 16, with availability expected in May 2025. This new model, positioned between the S25 and S25 Ultra, will feature a slimmer, curved-edge design and high-end specifications. Initial production is limited to 40,000 units.

articles.title: Get 8TB of Super-Fast SSD Storage in the Palm of Your Hand and Save $210 Today
articles.author: Oliver Haslam
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched the 8TB SanDisk Extreme portable SSD. It features USB-C port supporting USB 3.2 Gen 2 speeds, NVMe performance of up to 1050Mbps read and 1000Mbps write speeds, durability with the ability to withstand falls of up to three meters, and an IP65 rating for dust- and water-resistance. SanDisk claims that it has updated the firmware of the drive to prevent data loss.

articles.title: I tested Fairy vs 7 own-brand washing-up liquids
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Aldi's Magnum Washing-up Liquid, priced at 69p for 500ml, features an apple fragrance and a bottle made from 100% recycled materials. Morrisons Apple Washing-up Liquid, also costing 62p for 450ml, utilizes a bottle made from 50% recycled materials. Marks and Spencer's Original Washing-up Liquid, retailing at £1 for 500ml, features a cruelty free logo.

articles.title: NWSL jerseys ranked: Kansas City Current, Houston Dash look sharp; Gotham FC's unique crest doesn't work
articles.author: Sandra Herrera
articles.summary: NWSL launched new kits for the upcoming season. These kits represent updated product offerings for the league's teams.

articles.title: ASUS Expands 2025 Zenbook Lineup in Canada with the New Zenbook DUO and Zenbook 14
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: ASUS has launched the new Zenbook DUO (UX8406CA) and Zenbook 14 (UX3405CA) laptops in Canada, expanding its AI-powered Zenbook lineup. The Zenbook DUO features dual 14-inch OLED HDR touchscreens and an Intel Core Ultra 9 Processor, while the Zenbook 14 offers a thin-and-light design with an Intel Core Ultra 9 Processor and an OLED touchscreen. Both models are now available at various retailers, with an AMD-powered Zenbook 14 variant coming later this year.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends Z-A gameplay revealed as ‘core' game announced for Switch and mobile
articles.author: Lloyd Coombes Gaming Editor
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company announced Pokemon Legends Z-A, launching in 2024 on the Nintendo Switch, featuring a Paris-like Lumiose City with new Pokemon and trainer battles. Additionally, The Pokemon Company revealed Pokemon Champions, developed by The Pokemon Works and planned by Game Freak, which is a core battle experience game set to release in 2025 on Nintendo Switch and mobile.

articles.title: Tencent launches Hunyuan Turbo S AI model to compete with DeepSeek's R1
articles.author: Monitoring Desk
articles.summary: Tencent introduced Hunyuan Turbo S, a new AI model, which they claim answers queries faster than DeepSeek's R1. Tencent stated that Turbo S responds to queries within a second and matches DeepSeek-V3 in knowledge, math, and reasoning. Furthermore, Turbo S has lower usage costs than Tencent's previous AI models.

articles.title: net2phone Introduces Advanced AI Agent
articles.summary: net2phone introduced net2phone AI Agent, which is a scalable and customizable virtual agent designed to enhance customer experiences across sales, support, and administrative tasks. The AI Agent uses conversational AI to engage customers, answer questions, and execute tasks like managing appointments and processing returns, aiming to improve efficiency and reduce costs.

articles.title: Amazon\u2019s Alexa is getting a major upgrade for the AI chatbot era
articles.author: Journal Gazette
articles.summary: Amazon unveiled Alexa+, a revamped version of their voice assistant, Alexa. This new iteration is designed to be more conversational and capable of incorporating a user's personal preferences.

articles.title: Navigating Milestones: Stormont's New Programme for Government Achieves Key Goals
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: WordPress themes and SEO plugins simplify website optimization by offering tools to manage on-page SEO, create XML sitemaps, and analyze content. Companies like ThemeForest and StudioPress provide professionally designed themes and Yoast SEO is a well known plugin to use. These tools help website owners manage various SEO elements, automate tasks, and improve search engine rankings and visibility.

articles.title: net2phone introduces net2phone AI Agent
articles.author: Tip Ranks
articles.summary: net2phone launched net2phone AI Agent, a customizable virtual agent designed to improve customer experiences in sales, support, and administrative tasks. This AI agent uses conversational AI to interact with customers, answer questions, and perform tasks like managing appointments and processing returns, aiming for speed, consistency, and cost-effectiveness.

articles.title: 三星 Galaxy S25 Edge 將於 4 月 16 日正式亮相，挑戰 Apple 超薄手機市場
articles.author: Tech Ritual
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge on April 16th, aiming to compete in the ultra-thin phone market before Apple. The phone will feature a 200MP main camera, a 50MP ultra-wide camera, and will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. It will be available in light blue, black, and silver, with an initial production run of around 40,000 units.

articles.title: The Impressive Eufy X10 Pro Omni Robot Mop and Vacuum Has Never Been Cheaper Than This
articles.author: Kaylyn McKenna
articles.summary: Eufy has announced a discount on its X10 Pro Omni robot vacuum and mop, bringing the price down to $600 from its usual $800. The Eufy X10 Pro Omni features 8,000 Pa of suction power, a self-charging and self-emptying station, automatic mop pad washing and drying, and AI-powered mapping tools with obstacle avoidance.

articles.title: Shoppers say affordable and non-aerosol dry shampoo is ‘the best I've ever used'
articles.author: Meghan Coon
articles.summary: Hairgain has launched Peptide Puff Dry Shampoo, a non-aerosol dry shampoo priced at £14.99. The product features a puff dispenser for application and contains an advanced Peptide Complex with Biotin and Caffeine. Customers praise its effectiveness in absorbing oil and refreshing hair without the issues associated with aerosol dry shampoos.

articles.title: Interactive packaging makes cherry tomatoes a fun and healthy snack for kids
articles.summary: Meteorito developed the Nijasol special edition cherry tomato snack for Carrefour, featuring interactive packaging designed as a convenient lunch and snack option. The 'Tomatier' range aims to increase visual appeal and encourage interaction, making cherry tomatoes more attractive to younger consumers.

articles.title: Group NJZ has opened a new official SNS account.On the 27th, Newzins members announced the opening o..
articles.author: Ji Seung Hoon
articles.summary: Group NJZ will release a new song and debut song also named NJZ on March 23rd. The group will also perform under the name NZ at "Complex Con Hong Kong" in March. This announcement follows the group's independence from Adore and the unveiling of their new team name, NJZ.

articles.title: Tencent releases Hunyuan Turbo S, an AI model designed to respond instantly, saying it is competitive against DeepSeek's V3 model in commonly used AI tests (Vlad Savov/Bloomberg)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Tencent has launched Hunyuan Turbo S, an AI model designed for instant responses. The company claims it competes with DeepSeek's V3 model in standard AI tests, highlighting its advanced capabilities upon release.

articles.title: MWC 2025: Amdocs Unveils CES25, the Next-Generation of its Generative AI-Led Suite Built on the Cloud
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Amdocs launched CES25, powered by the Amdocs amAIz suite, to enable agentic customer experiences, comprehensive monetization models, and network and service automation for consumers and businesses. CES25 is an agile, open, modular, and configurable solution tailored for service providers of all sizes, supporting multi-cloud deployment and flexible consumption.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Secures Fourth Partnership, Expanding its Audience in Canada and the United States
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: NEXE Innovations Inc. has partnered with a North American distributor to introduce its BPI-certified compostable coffee pods into retail, office coffee services, and hospitality sectors. The initial order consists of over 150,000 pods across six SKUs and three brands, marking a significant step in eco-friendly innovation.

articles.title: These products make laundry feel like less of a chore — dryer balls, fabric shavers and more Stuff We Love
articles.author: Sierra Hoeger
articles.summary: Several new products designed to improve laundry and home organization are presented. These include a collapsible laundry basket for space-saving, reusable wool dryer balls to reduce drying time and eliminate static, a fabric shaver and lint brush for reviving clothes and furniture, shoe cleaning bags, a lint removal kit, a magnetic adjustable organizer, and a wall-mounted accordion-style drying rack. Additionally, the products include a closet spray designed to keep pests away.

articles.title: Infinix Unveils ZERO Series Mini Tri-Fold: A Game-Changing Foldable Concept
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Infinix is introducing the ZERO Series Mini Tri-Fold Concept Device, a triple-folding device that functions as a smartphone, fitness companion, and compact camera. The device aims to integrate into modern lifestyles and replace multiple gadgets with a single adaptable solution.

articles.title: Want to try Alexa Plus? Here are the Echo devices it'll work on
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa Plus, a new AI-powered voice assistant, initially in the US. The new service will be available early on current generation Echo Show devices and accessible through web browsers and the Alexa app, even if the user's device isn't fully supported.

articles.title: Start saving – a potential Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launch date has just been revealed
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: Samsung is rumored to unveil the Galaxy S25 Edge on April 16, with sales potentially starting in May. The phone is expected to be available in light blue, black, and silver.

articles.title: Front Load Washing Machine Rentals Save Money in Kolkata
articles.author: TINN
articles.summary: RentoMojo offers rental solutions for home appliances including washing machines, refrigerators, and air conditioners. They provide multiple rental plans and maintenance and support services. Their service offers reasonable security deposits with easy refund processes.

articles.title: Costway Nugget Ice Maker: Enjoy Ice Anytime and Anywhere!
articles.author: Renatha Nifield
articles.summary: Costway has launched the Costway Nugget Ice Maker, a portable ice maker that produces nugget ice in 6 minutes with a production capacity of 17 kg of ice per day. The ice maker features a self-cleaning function, one-touch operation, a sleek design, and quiet operation, and it is currently offered at a discounted price of $189.00.

articles.title: LookFantastic is set to launch its 2025 Beauty Egg - and here's how to sign up
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: LookFantastic is launching the Lookfantastic 2025 Beauty Egg, a limited edition beauty bundle for Easter. The Beauty Egg will retail for £60 and contain over £205 worth of beauty products and subscribers to The Box will be able to save a further 15% off the set.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 7 vs Flip 6
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy Z Flip 7, its next-generation foldable flip phone. The phone is expected to be a larger iteration of the previous model.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 7 CAD renders
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy Z Flip 7, a next-generation foldable flip phone. This iteration is expected to be larger than previous models.

articles.title: Samsung Z Flip 7 dimensions
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy Z Flip 7, a next-generation foldable flip phone. This iteration is expected to be larger than previous models while maintaining a familiar design.

articles.title: Z Flip 7 bigger display
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy Z Flip 7, a next-generation foldable flip phone. The new iteration is expected to be larger than its predecessors.

articles.title: ⚡Know Price, Specs and Details of Samsung M16 5G, Samsung M06 5G Launched in India
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Samsung Galaxy M16 5G and Samsung Galaxy M06 5G smartphones in India. The launch includes information on the prices, specifications, and features of these new Samsung smartphones.

articles.title: Housework sucks. We tried a robot vacuum/mop to see if it'd help save time & effort.
articles.author: Branded
articles.summary: Mova launched the Z50 Ultra, a robot vacuum and mop with features like auto-emptying and self-cleaning. The Z50 Ultra mops with hot water. There's a launch promo, offering it at a special price of S$1,499 for the first 50 buyers from Mar. 2 at 8pm.

articles.title: Tanduay unveils Superior Rum to welcome Year of the Snake
articles.summary: Tanduay Rum is celebrating the Year of the Snake with a limited-edition label for its Tanduay Superior Rum, highlighting its barrel-aging craftsmanship. Tanduay products, including the new limited-edition rum, are available for purchase through www.shots.ph, supermarkets, spirits stores, Lazada, and Shopee.

articles.title: Tencent launches AI model that it says is faster than DeepSeek-R1
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: Tencent launched Hunyuan Turbo S, a new AI model. Hunyuan Turbo S answers queries within a second. This model distinguishes itself from DeepSeek R1 and other slower models.

articles.title: How Olipop went from a laundry room lab to a billion dollar soda company
articles.author: Zachary Petit
articles.summary: Olipop, a prebiotic soda brand launched in 2018, has experienced significant success, closing a $50 million Series C round and achieving a $1.85 billion valuation. The brand surpassed $400 million in revenue last year and is now sold in nearly 50,000 stores, even outselling Coke at a major retailer.

articles.title: Enabling AI Transformation: TNL Mediagene's Ad2 AI Agent Debuts in March to Revolutionize Smart Advertising Decisions
articles.author: Tnl 公司
articles.summary: Ad2, a subsidiary of TNL Mediagene, is launching "Ad2 AI Agent" in March 2025. This AI-powered tool helps marketers identify optimal target audiences and ad placement strategies. The tool integrates AI Audience and AI Creative to enable more precise advertising decisions and breakthrough creativity.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers praise Ninja portable blender that's 'worth the hype' now 22% off
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: The Ninja Blast Portable Blender is available for £39 at Amazon and £39.99 directly from Ninja. This cordless, USB-rechargeable blender features a 530ml cup, stainless steel BlastBlade, and leak-proof lid, making it suitable for on-the-go smoothies. User reviews highlight its power and convenience, with some concerns regarding battery life.

articles.title: Guide: Monster Hunter Wilds Release Time and New Zealand Trick
articles.summary: Capcom is launching the new game 'Monster Hunter Wilds' on February 28 at 12am ET for PC. For PS5 and Xbox Series X/S, the game will be released at midnight local time, allowing players to use the 'New Zealand trick' to access the game early by changing their console's location settings.

articles.title: Galaxy A56 launch date
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to introduce its latest Galaxy A-series smartphones in India next week. The official unveiling is set for the near future.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A-series OS updates
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its newest Galaxy A-series smartphones in India next week.

articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to introduce its latest Galaxy A-series smartphones in India next week. The official unveiling is set to happen soon.

articles.title: Tencent releases new AI model, says replies faster than DeepSeek-R1
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Tencent has released Hunyuan Turbo S, a new AI model that answers queries faster than DeepSeek's R1. The model's capabilities in knowledge, math, and reasoning are comparable to DeepSeek-V3, and it is priced lower than previous Tencent models. This launch is a response to the success of DeepSeek's models.

articles.title: JUANA Skin reinvents beauty with a powerful new identity
articles.author: Sarah Joseph
articles.summary: JUANA Skin, the UAE's first CBD Skincare brand, has launched a complete rebranding with global ambitions. The skincare brand harnesses the power of Cannabinoids, and fuses cutting-edge biotechnology with nature's most powerful botanicals. With the relaunch, the brand is set to redefine the beauty landscape, bringing its revolutionary products to a global audience.

articles.title: Life Care Experience Shop: A new era in retail wellness
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: Life Care has launched the 'Life Care Experience Shop' in Sun Plaza, Romania. The shop features an AI-powered virtual assistant to provide personalized product recommendations and interactive testing zones for customers to explore Life Care's product lines, including health supplements, organic cosmetics, and eco-friendly home care products. The company plans to expand this concept to other locations in Bucharest and nearby countries, enhancing both their physical and digital retail presence.

articles.title: Srinivasa Rao Bittla's Vision: AI-Driven UCM and TaaS Transforming Software Quality and Customer Experience
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of AI-driven Testing-as-a-Service (TaaS) and AI-driven Use Case Monitoring (UCM) services. TaaS automates software testing, generating test cases and offering predictive testing capabilities, while UCM tracks customer interactions in real-time, providing insights for feature optimization and revenue recovery. These services aim to enhance software quality, customer engagement, and revenue optimization for businesses.

articles.title: JabChaho launches high-end laundry and sneaker care in Karachi
articles.author: Br Web Desk
articles.summary: JabChaho, a premium laundry and sneaker care startup, launched its app-based service in Karachi in 2024, targeting upscale neighborhoods. The company offers specialized care for luxury clothing and footwear, including a sneaker cleaning service with stain removal and sole restoration.

articles.title: Taboola introduces a ‘reimagined approach' to driving full-funnel performance
articles.summary: Taboola launched Realize, a product intended to expand its focus from native advertising to encompass the broader performance marketing landscape, according to CEO Adam Singolda.

articles.title: Las Vegas Sphere Unveils Official Name of Iconic Emoji Mascot – [your]NEWS
articles.author: your NEWS Media Newsroom
articles.summary: The Las Vegas Sphere has officially named its animated emoji character 'Orbi' and launched the 'Orbi Collection,' an exclusive merchandise line dedicated to the character. Fans can purchase Orbi-themed merchandise at shop.thesphere.com. The Sphere's Executive Vice President highlights this as a way for fans to connect with Orbi and the Sphere through branded merchandise.

articles.title: Design View With… LABASAD's Storm Wiggett
articles.author: Storm Wiggett
org: Barcelona School of Arts and Design
articles.summary: LABASAD introduces a new Online Master in Brand Design program, diverging from generalist design education. The program focuses on developing 'adaptive mastery,' combining creative expertise with strategic thinking and technological fluency. The course covers brand psychology, research methodologies, creative disciplines, brand storytelling, and launch planning, aiming to train brand leaders for the evolving design landscape.

articles.title: Founder Harivikash Bakthavatchalam Launched Dragon Marketing to Automate Digital Marketing Solutions With Higher Returns
articles.summary: Dragon Marketing, founded by Harivikash Bakthavatchalam, has launched its AI-driven marketing system, which includes 'Dragons' (AI Agents) and 'Fire Bots' (automation units). Beta testing has shown businesses reporting 3 to 5 times improvements in ROI, while reducing 40% in overall marketing costs. The company is offering exclusive beta access to businesses to celebrate the launch.

articles.title: Claim a free sample of FELIX cat food for your loveable rascal
org: Nestlé Purina UK Commercial Operations Ltd
articles.summary: Nestlé Purina UK is offering 100,000 free samples of FELIX As Good As it Looks Chicken in Jelly Wet Cat Food to new applicants via a designated sampling platform until December 31, 2025, or until all samples are claimed. Applicants must complete an online form to qualify, and the offer is hosted via SoPost.

articles.title: The Best Stove Top Cleaners of 2025
articles.author: Israel Hayom Shopping Team
articles.summary: The article presents several cleaning products for various household surfaces. These include a stovetop cleaner with non-abrasive pads, a grill and smoker cleaner with a super-strength gel, a full cleaning solution pack by The Pink Stuff, a cream by Scrub Daddy and Cif, Lysol Pro Kitchen Spray Cleaner, and a kitchen degreaser. These products target grease, grime, and bacteria, offering solutions for cooktops, grills, bathrooms, and kitchens.

articles.title: The Best Fabric Shavers of 2025
articles.author: Israel Hayom Shopping Team
articles.summary: The article reviews multiple fabric shavers from different brands, highlighting features like blade speed, battery life, adjustable settings, and suitability for various fabrics. Some models feature rechargeable batteries, multiple blades for efficiency, and adjustable settings for delicate fabrics, while others are battery-operated with ergonomic designs for portability, providing consumers with options based on their needs and preferences.

articles.title: The Rise of NIO: How a Chinese Innovator is Redefining Luxury Electric Vehicles
articles.summary: NIO, an electric vehicle manufacturer, is challenging traditional luxury car brands with its innovative products and services. The ET9 sedan, set to launch in 2025, features advanced charging capabilities and autonomous driving technology. NIO's Battery as a Service (BaaS) model allows drivers to swap batteries quickly, addressing range anxiety.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT now available for pre-order in the Philippines
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Huawei has started pre-orders for the Huawei Mate XT, a tri-fold smartphone, from February 28 to March 31, priced at ₱199,999. The pre-order includes a bundle worth ₱39,998, featuring a Huawei FreeClip and one-year accidental screen damage protection. The Mate XT offers single, dual, and triple screen modes and is available on Shopee, Lazada, TikTok, the Huawei Online Store, and Huawei Experience Stores.

articles.title: Samsung Flip7 launch date
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip7, a next-generation foldable smartphone, appeared in new CAD-based renders. These renders offer an early glimpse at the product's design and features, suggesting an upcoming product launch.

articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip7, a next-generation foldable smartphone, has been revealed through CAD-based renders. This provides an early look at the upcoming device.

articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip7, a next-generation foldable smartphone, has been revealed in new CAD renders. These renders provide an early look at the device's design and features before its official launch.

articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip7, a next-generation foldable smartphone, has emerged with CAD-based renders. These renders provide an early look at the upcoming device.

articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip7, a next-generation foldable smartphone, is shown in new CAD-based renders. These renders provide an early glimpse of the upcoming product.

articles.title: Happy Pokémon Day! Here's how to tune into the latest news on Pokémon Presents (VIDEO)
articles.author: Malay Mail
articles.summary: Nintendo has announced a new Pokémon Presents to update on the Pokémon world. The presentation will likely reveal the next game after Pokémon Violet and Scarlet. Updates on current Pokémon apps like the recently-launched Pokémon TCG Pocket mobile game are also anticipated.

articles.title: ஐபிஎல்லுக்காக ரூ.195-க்கு ஹாட்ஸ்டார் சப்ஸ்கிரிப்ஷனுடன் ஜியோவின் ரீசார்ஜ் திட்டம்.. மிஸ் பண்ணிடாதீங்க!
articles.summary: Jio introduced a new recharge plan that includes a Jio Hotstar subscription, timed with the IPL season. This combines data services with access to streaming content.

articles.title: Alexa+: Amazon Launches New AI-Powered Alexa Assistant With More Natural Conversation and Capabilities, Free for Prime Members and USD 19.99 for Non-Prime Users
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa+, a new version of its AI assistant with AI-powered features. This personalized assistant is free for Prime members and available to non-Prime members for USD 19.19. Alexa+ supports image analysis, travel itinerary creation, and offers more conversational interactions and can be accessed across multiple devices like Echo, Fire TV and Tablets.

articles.title: Hydrofast Launches Innovative Countertop Water Filters, Revolutionizing Healthy Home Hydration with B100 and C100 Models
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Hydrofast is launching two new countertop reverse osmosis water filters, the B100 and C100, in the U.S. on February 28, 2025, via Amazon, with plans to expand into Europe by April 2025. The B100 is priced at $229.00 (discounted from $299.00), while the C100 is priced at $329.00 (discounted from $399.00) and features a cold water function.

articles.title: EA Sport, LaLiga launch Next Gen Draft for talent discovery
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: LaLiga and EA Sports have launched Next Gen Draft. It is a project within the framework of the EA Sports FC Futures social impact programme. The project is designed to discover and develop young football talent.

articles.title: Sony Middle East and Africa Launches the LinkBuds Series at CAMP
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Sony Middle East and Africa launched the LinkBuds series at a dedicated launch event.

articles.title: Samsung's Now Brief: A Promising AI Feature That Falls Flat
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung introduced Now Brief with the Galaxy S25 series, an AI-driven feature intended to provide a personalized daily summary. Now Brief integrates data from various Samsung apps, but currently lacks depth, customization, and third-party app integration. Samsung has built the foundation for third-party integration and needs to improve and expand Now Brief's capabilities.

articles.title: Glow All the Way: Myntra Birthday Bash, Face Wash Deals You Cant Miss
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Dermatouch has introduced Dailyglow Bright & Even Skin Tone Face Wash with Niacinamide & Vitamin E, focusing on skin lightening. Pilgrim launches 1% Salicylic Acid Non-Drying Gel Face Wash for oily, acne-prone skin, using salicylic acid to unclog pores. MCaffeine's Daily Brightening Face Wash contains 1% Kojic Acid, Glutathione & C-Complex for brightening and evening skin tone, while Minimalist offers a 6% Oat Extract Gentle Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid for sensitive skin, providing soothing and moisturizing effects.

articles.title: Syndigo and Productsup Partner
articles.summary: Syndigo and Productsup have partnered to help companies scale product content across international markets. By combining Syndigo's AI-native platform with Productsup's commerce network, the partnership aims to distribute enriched product content across global advertising channels and help businesses navigate industry standards, ultimately improving ad performance and increasing conversions. This collaboration aims to make product content management easier for customers.

articles.title: I compared Fairy washing-up liquid to seven supermarket brands and came to surprising conclusion
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Fairy claims 'Fairyconomy' due to lasting twice as long. Aldi Magnum washing-up liquid contains 5-15% anionic surfactants and comes in a 100% recycled bottle. Morrisons Apple Washing-up Liquid has a 'powerful grease cutting action' and a 50% recycled bottle.

articles.title: LG Upgrades Old Smart TV With WebOS For Owners
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: LG Electronics is offering the latest upgrade of the webOS smart TV platform to owners of older LG 4k and 8k Smart TVs. This upgrade provides a refreshed and modern user interface, similar to the ones found on newer LG models.

articles.title: AFRIWOK OFFICALLY LAUNCHES, SET TO REVOLUTIONIZE NIGERIAS DIGITAL MARKETPLACE
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Afriwok officially launched its brand on February 20, 2024, in Lagos. The launch included the introduction of Afriwok Mobile App, its first brand product, which is a digital marketplace.

articles.title: Cyber Social Media Marketing Unveils Major Platform Upgrade with Advanced AI Algorithms and Tools to Deliver Greater Value for Global Users
articles.author: Denver
articles.summary: Cyber Social Media Marketing (CYBSMM) launched a significant platform upgrade. The update includes an enhanced user interface, AI-driven algorithms, and a new in-platform video "like" feature to boost user engagement. This upgrade enables businesses and creators to reach target audiences more effectively, drive higher sales, and maximize brand exposure.

articles.title: Leaked Galaxy Z Flip 7 renders look nearly identical to Flip 6
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: A leak reveals details of the Galaxy Flip 7. The Galaxy Flip 7 appears similar to the previous model.

articles.title: Alexa+ unveiled: Amazon takes voice assistance to next level with AI capabilities
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Alexa+, a new AI-driven voice assistant powered by generative AI, which offers more intuitive and human-like experience. Alexa+ has features like controlling smart home devices, assisting with music streaming, managing restaurant reservations, ordering groceries from Amazon Fresh, booking delivery through Grubhub and Uber Eats. It will be available in April 2025 for $19.99 per month, with free access granted to Amazon Prime members.

articles.title: Microsoft Surface Pro 11 Review
articles.author: Chris Coke
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched the Surface Pro 11, featuring Snapdragon X processors and enhanced display capabilities.  The Surface Pro 11 is priced between $799 and $1,999 and is targeted towards students, workers, and anyone needing a versatile tablet with Windows app support. Optional accessories such as a keyboard ($280) and stylus ($100) are available.

articles.title: Darlie Launches 2-in-1 Mouthwash Toothpaste in Campaign by The Shout Group/FCB Shout
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: Darlie has launched Malaysia's first 2-in-1 mouthwash toothpaste, combining the benefits of toothpaste and mouthwash. FCB SHOUT, Darlie Malaysia's creative agency, has developed a multi-channel campaign to support the launch, featuring various media, including digital platforms, billboards, and influencer marketing. The product is strategically launched nearing Ramadan because fresh breath is especially crucial for many Malaysians during this period.

articles.title: iPhone 16E review: Eh, it's alright
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: Apple has released the iPhone 16E, positioned as its most affordable phone in the iPhone 16 series, featuring a 6.1-inch OLED screen, a 48-megapixel main camera, and Apple's new C1 modem. It lacks some features found in higher-end models like MagSafe, Dynamic Island, and an ultrawide camera, but boasts good battery life and incorporates Apple Intelligence. The iPhone 16E is targeted towards users with older iPhones seeking an upgrade with essential features at a lower price point.

articles.title: ‘Flour Water Salt Bread' Coming To East Avenue
articles.author: Michael Dinan
articles.summary: Flour Water Salt Bread is opening a new take-out bakery in New Canaan at 53 East Ave. The bakery, launched by Robert VanKeuren, will offer a variety of sourdough breads, pastries, and may include a home baking section with items like pie crusts and pastry creams.

articles.title: Mack Weldon Silver Crew T-Shirt Review: My Honest Opinion After 10 Months of Testing
articles.author: Joseph Cheatham
articles.summary: A new T-shirt made with 85% Supima Cotton, is being introduced and tested for its shape, softness, and fit. The shirt aims to offer premium fabric with antimicrobial silver threads for odor control and a tailored-but-relaxed cut, for use in various situations.

articles.title: Epzen launches $13 Sol de Janeiro dupe
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: Epzen has launched a new SKIN DRENCH TRIPLE MOISTURE BODY WASH priced at $13, formulated with a triple-moisture formula and featuring a scent similar to Sol de Janeiro's Bum Bum Cream. MCoBeauty offers the EVERYDAY SMOOTHING BODY CREAM infused with a Sol de Janeiro-inspired scent profile and the ENDLESS SUMMER KIT – NO.2, a travel-friendly trio containing a fragrance mist, body wash, and smoothing body cream, providing a Sol de Janeiro-inspired experience.

articles.title: ‘Peckish' app allows speedy delivery from independent grocers
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: An unnamed company will introduce a technologically advanced service, providing independent retailers the ability to offer their customers rapid deliveries. This new service aims to enhance the delivery capabilities of these retailers.

articles.title: iPhone 16e Australian review: Is this Apple's version of an Aldi special?
articles.author: Mark Furler
articles.summary: Apple introduced the iPhone 16e, a more affordable option within the iPhone 16 lineup, featuring a 6.1 inch display, Apple Intelligence, and the A18 chip. Apple claims the battery offers up to 26 hours of video playback. The iPhone 16e includes a 48MP 'two in one' camera which allows for a 2x optical zoom, which can be stretched to 10x with digital zoom.

articles.title: GWM Cannon: Expanded range coming to better take on Triton, D-Max
articles.author: Jack Quick
articles.summary: GWM has launched its updated and renamed Cannon dual-cab in Australia. More versions of the Cannon are expected to be released in a few months.

articles.title: Want your big screen TV mounted for free? Check out Walmart's home service freebies
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Walmart is offering free home services in partnership with Angi on select purchases, including TVs over 75 inches, TV stands, and mattresses. Customers can add these services at checkout on Walmart's website or app, and Angi will then schedule an appointment to complete the service.

articles.title: Want your big screen TV mounted for free? Check out Walmart's home service freebies
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Walmart is offering free home services, such as assembly and mounting, on select purchases like TVs over 75 inches, TV stands, and mattresses through a partnership with Angi. Customers can add these services at checkout online or by scanning a QR code in-store.

articles.title: Want your big screen TV mounted for free? Check out Walmart's home service freebies
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Walmart, in partnership with Angi, now offers complimentary home services for eligible TVs over 75 inches, TV stands, and mattresses. Customers can add these services at checkout on Walmart's website, app, or in-store via QR codes, after which Angi schedules an appointment to complete the service, including assembly, setup, and disposal.

articles.title: Beauty Diary: Aussies go wild for cult US-brand Bubble Skincare, data shows
articles.author: Rebekah Scanlan
articles.summary: Bubble Skincare launched in Australia and has gained popularity, selling a product every 57 seconds. Their newest product launch, the $15 Tell All Juicy Secret Lip Balm, is already an Aussie favorite. Bestsellers include the Slam Dunk Moisturiser ($28) and the Rise & Shine Brightening Skincare Routine 3pc Set ($54).

articles.title: 'World's supermarket' embraces era of AI
articles.summary: The Chinagoods platform in Yiwu has integrated AI tools like DeepSeek to help merchants with online marketing, video creation, and multilingual communication. These AI applications, used independently by Yiwu merchants, have been utilized over 1 billion times and are facilitating international trade by overcoming language barriers and reducing design costs for vendors.

articles.title: The biggest PS5 SSD on the market has had its price slashed by more than ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The price of a PS5 SSD has been reduced by $330, reaching a new lowest-ever price.

articles.title: The Evolution of Tech Transfer and Innovation is Here
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Wellspring is launching Evolve, a next-generation technology transfer platform. The launch is taking place at AUTM 2025. Wellspring also introduced new brand identity.

articles.title: Amazon's AI-powered Alexa+ to cost non-Prime users $20 a month
articles.author: The Spokesman-Review
articles.summary: Amazon unveiled its revamped voice assistant, Alexa Plus (Alexa+), at an event for journalists and employees. The company aims to simplify customers' lives with this product.

articles.title: MWC 2025: Amdocs Unveils CES25, the Next-Generation of its Generative AI-Led Suite Built on the Cloud
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Amdocs' CES25, powered by the amAIz suite, enables agentic customer experiences, comprehensive monetization models, and network and service automation for consumers and businesses. The agile, open, modular, and configurable CES25 is tailored for service providers of all sizes and supports multi-cloud deployment, unlocking the potential of next-generation technology capabilities.

articles.title: Wait, what? The Lenovo Legion Go 2's first performance impressions are supposedly already here - ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Lenovo is developing the Legion Go 2. The Legion Go 2 is currently a prototype, and early performance insights are potentially available through a YouTube video.

articles.title: MG Motor Unveils the All-New MG ZS: Ticks All Your Drives
articles.author: bizbahrain
articles.summary: MG Motor Bahrain, through Zayani Motors, has launched the all-new MG ZS, a crossover SUV. The MG ZS combines design, technology, and safety features.

articles.title: Nambawan Super Goes Live With SmartStream's AI-driven Air Solution
articles.author: Malaysian National News Agency
articles.summary: SmartStream Technologies announced Nambawan Super Limited implemented SmartStream's AI-driven Air solution. This implementation provides a new service for Nambawan Super Limited within financial transaction lifecycle management.

articles.title: Amazon's Alexa+ an upgrade for the AI chatbot era
articles.author: Madison
articles.summary: Amazon unveiled Alexa+, a revamped version of their voice assistant, Alexa. The new Alexa+ is more conversational, incorporates user preferences, and can handle tasks such as booking on the user's behalf. This brings the popular voice assistant into the artificial intelligence era.

articles.title: MG Motor introduces all-new MG ZS SUV in Bahrain market
articles.author: GCC Business News
articles.summary: MG Motor Bahrain – Zayani Motors has launched the all-new MG ZS, a crossover SUV. This new product combines design, technology, and safety features.

articles.title: Dunkin' spring menu 2025: See the 4 items making their debut
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Dunkin' will introduce its spring 2025 menu, featuring four new items alongside the return of the Dunkalatte.

articles.title: Curry Brand Unleashes the Curry 12 ‘Spark'—A Fiery Tribute to Stephen Curry's College Legacy
articles.author: The Source
articles.summary: Curry Brand is launching a new sneaker called 'Curry' on Friday, February 28.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 renders surface online, revealing a similar design: What we think
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to launch its next-generation foldable phones, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Z Fold 7, around July. These devices are expected to feature specification upgrades, design improvements, and new functionalities.

articles.title: Tencent releases new AI model, says replies faster than DeepSeek-R1
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Tencent launched Hunyuan Turbo S, a new artificial intelligence model. This model answers queries faster than DeepSeek's R1, reflecting competition in the AI sector.

articles.title: Apple iPhone 16e: Five Things Nobody Told You
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Apple is preparing to release a new iPhone. The new iPhone has some unknown features.

articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A brand has introduced the latest addition to its spicy cracker lineup.

articles.title: Adidas is dropping a new Handball Spezial sneaker: Here's when to grab this Samba-like style ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Adidas is releasing a new Handball Spezial sneaker style.

articles.title: PLT & Nektium Pharma Announce New Clinical Study on Zynamite® S Demonstrating Enhanced Non-Stim Mental ...
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: A company has developed a new water-soluble and taste-neutral form of an award-winning ingredient. This new form is designed for use in beverages and other taste-sensitive formulations. The ingredient aims to improve the appeal and applicability of products in the food and beverage industry.

articles.title: Deals and Steals on glam products
articles.author: Good Morning America
articles.summary: Ritani and Yummie are offering products with significant savings. Tory Johnson promotes these brand's products.

articles.title: 1-on-1 with Amazon CEO Andy Jassy as company reboots Alexa with AI
articles.author: Good Morning America
articles.summary: Alexa+ introduces a new service powered by generative AI. It integrates with existing apps and services, enabling users to interact using their voice.

articles.title: Microsoft's .NET 10 arrives in first preview
articles.author: Info World
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched the first preview of .NET 10, a new version of their flagship software development platform. This version introduces C# 14 and provides enhancements to components such as ASP.NET Core, Blazor, and .NET MAUI.

articles.title: Vaseline Gluta Hya Serum-in-Lotion launched
articles.author: Staff Correspondent
articles.summary: Vaseline, in collaboration with Unilever Bangladesh, launched the 'Vaseline Gluta Hya Serum-in-Lotion'. The new product is available in two variants: Dewy Radiance, enriched with Glutathione, Hyaluron and Niacinamide; and Flawless Glow, containing Glutathione, Hyaluron and Pro-Retinol.

articles.title: Prime Has Officially Ended This Quirky, Yet Popular New England Service
articles.author: Jolana Miller
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its "Try It Before You Buy It" service, which allowed customers to try items for seven days before purchasing. This decision is due to limited scalability and increased customer use of Amazon's new AI-powered features like virtual try-on, personalized size recommendations, review highlights, and improved size charts.
